# zitadel_organization (Data Source)

Datasource representing an organization in ZITADEL, which is the highest level after the instance and contains several
other resource including policies if the configuration differs to the default policies on the instance.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) ID of the organization

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) Name of the org.
- `primary_domain` (String) Primary domain of the org
- `state` (String) State of the org, supported values: ORGANIZATION_STATE_UNSPECIFIED, ORGANIZATION_STATE_ACTIVE,
  ORGANIZATION_STATE_INACTIVE, ORGANIZATION_STATE_REMOVED
